resources.string: Asyut is the capital of the modern Asyut Governoratein Egypt, which has one of the largest Coptic Catholic bishopric churches in the country; the ancient city of the same name, which is situated nearby. The modern city is located at 27°11′00″N 31°10′00″E, while the ancient city is located at 27°10′00″N 31°08′00″E.\n

Address : Assiut 71515 Arab Republic of Egypt 
 Assiut University is a university located in Assiut, Egypt. 
 It was established in October 1957 as the first university in Upper Egypt 
 Web site : http://www.aun.edu.eg/

Address : Elwalydiya, Assiut, Egypt \n Al-Azhar University occupies a lofty place in the minds and hearts of Egyptians, Arabs and Muslims throughout the world. It has expanded its appeal to students of science not only from Egyptians but also from their counterparts from all countries of the Islamic world. \n Web site : http://www.azhar.edu.eg/
Address : Bridge, Bani Morr, Markaz El-Fath, Assiut Governorate \n The Assiut Barrage is a dam on the Nile River in the city of Assiut in Upper Egypt. It was completed in 1903.

 Epididymis is a cylindrical building allows the passage of water under a road or railway or any other type of obstacles and is often buried under the soil. Built culvert pipes (pipes) or reinforced concrete or other materials,
 and offset by the watercourse is raised, which is a bank of water is built above the ground. Can be built on a bridge culvert body for crossing vehicles and humans and have a different Caldaira and oval and flat bottom and box-like shape and a fruit of pear shapes. It can be built culverts of different materials such as cement and aluminum and plastic class high-density polyethylene Aithalin. It can be used as two substances or more as part of a unified building, 
 for example, can build a pipe on the bottom corrugated open pads (pillars) concrete. 
 Plastic and intra Batain to repair culverts and crumbling old without the need to drill or fill the roads. 
 To prevent the collapse of the old culverts fill the gaps located between them and plastic mortar Batain slave textures.
